faqs.q: Is there a free plan or trial?
faqs.a: Yes. BioMaint offers a 14-day free trial with full access so you can evaluate before committing. We do not offer a free-forever plan.
Admins and Technicians require paid seats. Requesters (users who only submit or track requests) are unlimited and free on every plan.

faqs.q: Can I switch between monthly and annual billing?
faqs.a: Yes. You can choose monthly or annual billing. Annual billing includes a discount.
Yes. The BioMaint mobile app for iOS and Android is included in all plans at no extra cost.

faqs.q: Are there setup or hidden fees?
faqs.a: No. The price you see is the price you pay. There are no setup or hidden fees.

faqs.q: What if I change the number of seats mid-cycle?
faqs.a: You can add seats anytime (prorated for the remainder of the billing period). Reductions take effect at the next renewal.

faqs.q: Can I upgrade or downgrade plans?
faqs.a: Yes. Upgrades apply immediately (prorated). Downgrades take effect at the next billing cycle.
Your account remains active until the end of your billing period. Youâ€™ll have 30 days to export your data before deletion.

faqs.q: Who owns our data and can we export it?
faqs.a: You own your data. You can export during your subscription and for 30 days after cancellation.
All plans include email and in-app support.

faqs.q: Are there usage or storage limits?
faqs.a: Fair-use applies to API and exports to ensure service quality. File uploads are limited to 100 MB per file.

faqs.q: How do you keep data private and secure?
faqs.a: We use multi-factor authentication, IP protection, 256-bit SSL encryption, intrusion detection, minimum password strength algorithms, CAPTCHA protection on failed login attempts, daily multi-server/geography backups, and more. In short: we take security very seriously.
No. BioMaint is only available as a secure cloud-hosted platform. Self-hosting or on-premises deployment is not available at this time.
